    The GUI package in tk.airshipcraft.commonlib offers a robust framework for creating and managing graphical user interfaces (GUIs) within a Minecraft server environment.

    A utility class for scanning the classpath to find classes of a particular type.

    A utility class for efficient parsing of UUID instances from strings and for converting UUID instances to strings.

    Provides utility methods for null-safe operations, inspired by JavaScript's nullish coalescing and optional chaining.

    Functional interface for null-check operations.

    The ProgressionCurve class provides a calculation model to determine progression requirements within a game.

    Provides functionality to search and retrieve subclasses of a given superclass dynamically.
